labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: you should be able to drag it both ways.
data.short_description: You are unable to drag a server icon upwards, but you can downwards (This only happens on a certain window size.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have multiple servers enough to be able to scroll up and down. - Attempt to drag any icon, and drag it upwards if it is at the bottom.
